title: The Sewerside Chronicles
description: Running a cutting-edge fashion label from a small Devon seaside town, Che Capri and Travis wereliving the dream. Sewerside’s first collection had been a hit, but now cash is running out an theirambitions of making it big are disappearing fast. It’s time to hatch a plan – which sees them joinedby graffiti artists, DJ’s, MC’s, skateboarders and counter-cultural provocateurs intent on resisting the blaming down of society by consumer forces. Embodying the ideals of a post-punk, rave-influenced generation, Sewerside Chronicles is an exciting and comic combination of fashion, politics, raves in the countryside and anarchy at Glastonbury.Zip up, button down and come along for the outrageous ride…
author: Tim Lay
